meanings.definition: Not growing old or showing the effects of age.
meanings.sent1: The painting of the ageless woman looked as young as ever.
meanings.sent2: She had an ageless beauty that seemed to defy time.
meanings.sent3: The ageless vampire joked that she had been using anti-aging cream for centuries.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was ageless, like a timeless melody that never fades.
meanings.sent5: The ageless oak tree stood tall and proud, unaffected by the years.

meanings.sent1: Legends say the fountain of youth grants ageless life to those who drink from it.
meanings.sent2: The bond between the two friends was ageless, enduring through all trials.
meanings.sent3: The ageless flame of the candle burned brightly through the night.
meanings.sent4: His words of wisdom were like an ageless river that flowed through generations.
meanings.sent5: The stars in the night sky seemed ageless, shining since the beginning of time.

meanings.definition: Timeless; not affected by the passage of time.
meanings.sent1: The classic novel had an ageless appeal that captivated readers of all ages.
meanings.sent2: The ageless design of the watch made it a popular choice for many.
meanings.sent3: In the ageless world of dreams, anything is possible.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, a sound both ageless and infectious.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins stood as a testament to the ageless beauty of the past.
